creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
1. Added RichTextRun.getAlignment and RichTextRun.setAlignment
as requested by Christoph de Mattia <christoph.de.mattia@twt-gmbh.de>

2. Added RichTextRun.getIndentLevel as requested by Tales Paiva Nogueira
<tales@great.ufc.br>

3. Updated how-to file how-to-shapes.xml.

4. All format modifiers in TextBox are marked as deprecated. User must use
TextRun/RichTextRun to work with the text format.

Yegor

Created attachment 18754
patch with the changes
creator: yegor@dinom.ru

text: Thanks for this Yegor, I'll try to find time to commit it this weekend
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Patch applied, thanks for that. Sorry it took so long!
